title: Hello World !
job: As a full-stack web developer, I design and develop complete web applications.
job2: From strategic planning to development, I support companies in successfully delivering their digital projects.
job3: I use a variety of technologies, such as JavaScript, React, Next.js, Vue.js for the frontend, and languages like Node.js and PHP for the backend. I also handle database integration, API management, and application security. My goal is to ensure a smooth user experience while guaranteeing the robustness and scalability of the system.
text: Full Stack Web Developer </br> Specialized in Frontend
